text: @RapidBI @LithiumTech Hi Mike — Please send a Tweet to @KloutSupport and our support team will help you out from there!

@RapidBI @LithiumTech Hi Mike — All Klout registered user data (including your name, password, and network tokens) will be purged from both Klout & Lithium datastores. To permanently delete your information ahead of the shutdown date, go to https://t.co/eWxuapwtMp and follow the included directions.

To all of our fans: after careful consideration we have decided to shut down the Klout website & the Klout Score. This will happen on May 25, 2018. It has been a pleasure serving you, and thank you for your ongoing support over the years. Details here: https://t.co/xCNdYachxF
